DISNEY STREAMING SERVICES (BAMTECH Media) | Senior Software Engineers | Full Time | ONSITE (New York, NY) or REMOTE (US Only)

BAMTECH Media, a technology subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company, is looking for Senior Software Engineers to join the Media Engineering Team.

BAMTECH Media develops premium digital media products for many of our partners such as MLB.TV, NHL.TV, PlayStation Vue and ESPN+. We are paving the way for the next-generation media and sports technologies. Media Engineering works on building out scalable distributed systems for media production pipeline that is core to our products. If you are interested in joining us in the pursuit of not only crafting new media products but also enjoying the products you build, we want to hear from you!

Technologies: Java, Spring, Scala, full AWS stack, Reactive Programming. Experience in these is preferred but not required.

Email: tanya.chawla@bamtechmedia.com OR Apply: https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/new-york/sr-software-engi... More info: https://www.bamtechmedia.com/
